trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Abilene
There was one other sighting in Abilene on or around October 23rd 2008
divs: sighting detailsmy husband and i were sitting on our back porch wehn we both saw out of the due east sky reddish, orangish, yellowish, lites goin back and forth in a rectangular way from right to left and back again about two and 1\2 times and then it would disappear completely and then about 6 minutes later it happened again about the same spot maybe over alittle doing the same thing....this happened 5 times.........off and on again.. the lights were not blinking just goin back and forth from right to left and repeated it again the same way........this was all due east of our airport???? my husband is retired military and this is not anything he has ever seen, nor i, and he worked on the b1 bomber and flight line.
